description: Mapping between Tiled object types and Olympe Engine prefab names (registered names, not paths)

notes.usage: Add new mappings here to define how Tiled objects map to Olympe prefabs
notes.collision: Objects of type 'collision' are converted to CollisionZone_data components automatically
notes.way: Polyline objects of type 'way' are converted to patrol paths (AIBlackboard_data.patrolPoints)
notes.sector: Polygon or rectangle objects of type 'sector' define level boundaries
